biotools.summary:
RegulationSpotter is a web-based tool for the user-friendly annotation and interpretation of 'extratranscriptic' DNA variants. It annotates individual variants with underlying regulatory features in an intuitive way by assessing over 100 genome-wide annotations. Additionally, it calculates a score, which reflects the regulatory potential of the variant region.
Phenotypic data can be used to focus on likely disease genes.

bioschemas.name: RegulationSpotter
